body:
Here's a benchmark of Symbol#to_proc vs. using a block on ruby 1.8.7 and 1.9.2 ...  The block is significantly faster on 1.8.7, but the Symbol#to_proc is slightly faster on 1.9.2 ... Might want to switch back to Symbtol#to_proc once 1.8.7 support is dropped.

## Start symbol_to_proc_speed_test.rb
  require 'benchmark'
  a = Array.new(1000000, 0)
  Benchmark.bm(15) do |b|
    b.report("Symbol#to_proc:") { a.map(&:to_f) }
    b.report("Block:") { a.map { |v| v.to_f } }
  end

## Benchmarking
  > rvm use ruby-1.8.7-head
  Using /Users/justin/.rvm/gems/ruby-1.8.7-head
  > ruby ./symbol_to_proc_speed_test.rb 
                          user          system      total        real
  Symbol#to_proc:  0.600000   0.050000   0.650000 (  0.697612)
  Block:                 0.360000   0.040000   0.400000 (  0.449945)
  > rvm use ruby-1.9.2-head
  Using /Users/justin/.rvm/gems/ruby-1.9.2-head
  > ruby ./symbol_to_proc_speed_test.rb 
                            user          system      total        real
  Symbol#to_proc:  0.230000   0.030000   0.260000 (  0.266599)
  Block:                 0.290000   0.010000   0.300000 (  0.330102)
